name: Water Bears
description:
A 3D puzzle game for everyone!

Challenge your spatial reasoning. Mix colors. Make the most of your limited resources.

50 puzzles! No ads! No in-app purchases!

*** 2015 Serious Play Conference - Best of Show! (http://www.seriousplayconference.com/awards/) ***
*** Children's Technology Review - Editor's Choice, For Excellence in Design (http://reviews.childrenstech.com/ctr/review.php?id=18520) ***

These water bears are sad and dehydrated. They need YOU to help get water to fall on their bubbles. Water bears are picky drinkers, though, so each one will only accept water of a particular color. You'll need to put your pipes in the right place and manipulate the color of the water to make all of the water bears happy.

Have a question or want to give feedback?
Email – waterbears@schellgames.com
Facebook – facebook.com/waterbearsgame

*** Are you an educator? Water Bears was originally designed to give players hands-on experience with Systems Thinking concepts. Water Bears EDU is available on the GlassLab platform, where educators can use analytics and classroom management tools, along with lesson plans and other materials to help teach Systems Thinking. For more information, go to glasslabgames.org. ***
